001
002package com.commercetools.http.apachehttp;
003
004import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.InputStream;
007import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
010import java.util.function.Supplier;
011import java.util.stream.Collectors;
012import java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream;
013
014import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
015
016import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
017import org.apache.commons.io.input.AutoCloseInputStream;
018import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleBody;
019import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleHttpResponse;
020import org.apache.hc.client5.http.async.methods.SimpleResponseConsumer;
021import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.async.CloseableHttpAsyncClient;
022import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.async.HttpAsyncClientBuilder;
023import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.nio.PoolingAsyncClientConnectionManagerBuilder;
024import org.apache.hc.client5.http.nio.AsyncClientConnectionManager;
025import org.apache.hc.client5.http.ssl.ClientTlsStrategyBuilder;
026import org.apache.hc.core5.http.ContentType;
027import org.apache.hc.core5.http.Header;
028import org.apache.hc.core5.http.HttpHeaders;
029import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.AsyncRequestProducer;
030import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.ssl.TlsStrategy;
031import org.apache.hc.core5.http.nio.support.AsyncRequestBuilder;
032import org.apache.hc.core5.http2.HttpVersionPolicy;
033import org.apache.hc.core5.reactor.IOReactorStatus;
034import org.apache.hc.core5.reactor.ssl.TlsDetails;
035
036public class CtApacheHttpClient extends HttpClientBase {
037    public static final int MAX_REQUESTS = 64;
038
039    private final CloseableHttpAsyncClient apacheHttpClient;
040
041    private final Supplier<HttpAsyncClientBuilder> clientBuilder = CtApacheHttpClient::createClientBuilder;
042
043    public static HttpAsyncClientBuilder createClientBuilder() {
044        return createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(MAX_REQUESTS, MAX_REQUESTS).build());
045    }
046
047    public static HttpAsyncClientBuilder createClientBuilder(AsyncClientConnectionManager cm) {
048        return HttpAsyncClientBuilder.create().setVersionPolicy(HttpVersionPolicy.NEGOTIATE).setConnectionManager(cm);
049    }
050
051    public static PoolingAsyncClientConnectionManagerBuilder createConnectionManager(final int maxConnTotal,
052            final int maxConnPerRoute) {
053        final TlsStrategy tlsStrategy = ClientTlsStrategyBuilder.create()
054                .useSystemProperties()
055                .setTlsDetailsFactory(
056                    sslEngine -> new TlsDetails(sslEngine.getSession(), sslEngine.getApplicationProtocol()))
057                .build();
058        return PoolingAsyncClientConnectionManagerBuilder.create()
059                .setMaxConnPerRoute(maxConnPerRoute)
060                .setMaxConnTotal(maxConnTotal)
061                .setTlsStrategy(tlsStrategy);
062    }
063
064    public CtApacheHttpClient() {
065        apacheHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().build();
066        init();
067    }
068
069    public CtApacheHttpClient(final int maxConnTotal, final int maxConnPerRoute) {
070        apacheHttpClient = createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(maxConnTotal, maxConnPerRoute).build()).build();
071        init();
072    }
073
074    private void init() {
075        if (!(apacheHttpClient.getStatus() == IOReactorStatus.ACTIVE)) {
076            apacheHttpClient.start();
077        }
078    }
079
080    public CtApacheHttpClient(final BuilderOptions options) {
081        apacheHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get()).build();
082        init();
083    }
084
085    public CtApacheHttpClient(final int maxConnTotal, final int maxConnPerRoute, final BuilderOptions options) {
086        apacheHttpClient = options
087                .plus(createClientBuilder(createConnectionManager(maxConnTotal, maxConnPerRoute).build()))
088                .build();
089        init();
090    }
091
092    public CtApacheHttpClient(final Supplier<HttpAsyncClientBuilder> builderSupplier) {
093        apacheHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
094        init();
095    }
096
097    private AsyncRequestProducer toApacheRequest(final ApiHttpRequest httpRequest) {
098        final String method = httpRequest.getMethod().toString();
099        final AsyncRequestBuilder builder = AsyncRequestBuilder.create(method);
100        builder.setUri(httpRequest.getUri());
101        httpRequest.getHeaders().getHeaders().forEach((entry) -> builder.addHeader(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));
102
103        if (httpRequest.getBody() != null) {
104            //default media type is JSON, if other media type is set as a header, use it
105            ContentType mediaType = ContentType.APPLICATION_JSON.withCharset(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
106            if (httpRequest.getHeaders()
107                    .getHeaders()
108                    .stream()
109                    .anyMatch(s -> s.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE))) {
110                mediaType = ContentType
111                        .parse(Objects.requireNonNull(httpRequest.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)));
112            }
113
114            builder.setEntity(httpRequest.getBody(), mediaType);
115        }
116        return builder.build();
117    }
118
119    @Override
120    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
121        final CompletableFuture<SimpleHttpResponse> apacheResponseFuture = new CompletableFuture<>();
122        apacheHttpClient.execute(toApacheRequest(request), SimpleResponseConsumer.create(),
123            new CompletableFutureCallbackAdapter<>(apacheResponseFuture));
124        return apacheResponseFuture.thenApplyAsync(CtApacheHttpClient::toResponse, executor());
125    }
126
127    private static ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> toResponse(final SimpleHttpResponse response) {
128        final Map<String, List<Header>> apacheHeaders = Arrays.stream(response.getHeaders())
129                .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(Header::getName));
130
131        final ApiHttpHeaders apiHttpHeaders = new ApiHttpHeaders(apacheHeaders.entrySet()
132                .stream()
133                .flatMap(
134                    e -> e.getValue().stream().map(value -> ApiHttpHeaders.headerEntry(e.getKey(), value.getValue())))
135                .collect(Collectors.toList()));
136
137        final byte[] bodyNullable = Optional.ofNullable(response.getBody()).map((SimpleBody entity) -> {
138            try {
139                final boolean gzipEncoded = Optional.ofNullable(response.getFirstHeader(HttpHeaders.CONTENT_ENCODING))
140                        .map(Header::getValue)
141                        .map(v -> v.equalsIgnoreCase("gzip"))
142                        .orElse(false);
143                final InputStream body = new ByteArrayInputStream(entity.getBodyBytes());
144                final InputStream content = gzipEncoded ? new GZIPInputStream(body) : body;
145                final AutoCloseInputStream autoCloseInputStream = new AutoCloseInputStream(content);
146                return IOUtils.toByteArray(autoCloseInputStream);
147            }
148            catch (final IOException e) {
149                throw new HttpException(e);
150            }
151        }).orElse(null);
152
153        return new ApiHttpResponse<>(response.getCode(), apiHttpHeaders, bodyNullable, response.getReasonPhrase());
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public void closeDelegate() throws Exception {
158        apacheHttpClient.close();
159    }
160}
